dct_title_s: طرق مواصلات الجمهورية العربية المتحدة / الجمهورية العربية, المتحدة وزارة النقل و البترول و الثروة المعدنية, الموءسسة المصرية العامة للطرق و الكبارى.
dct_description_sm: Map showing cities, roads and other transportation routes as well as medical services, rest houses, gas stations, telephones, and points of interest in the United Arab Republic. Points of interest shown pictorially. Southern portion of map on second side printed in three segments. Panel title. Includes illustrations, distance charts, explanations of traffic signs, ancillary map of maritime agencies along the Suez Canal, inset map of major roads in the Western Desert, and 3 inset maps showing ways of entry into Cairo, Suez, and Port Said. "[78/364]."
dct_creator_sm: United Arab Republic. Muʼassasah al-Miṣrīyah al-ʻĀmmah lil-Ṭuruq wa-al-Kabārī
الجمهورية العربية المتحدة. الموءسسة المصرية العامة للطرق و الكبارى
